name: MP® NonSanded 923
description: MP® NonSanded 923 is a one-part, latex-Portland cement grout that provides the user the highest performance available in the industry, in an easy to use, just-add-water material. Its unique blend of Portland cement, specially graded silica fillers, latex modifiers and colorfast pigments provides for a superior grout with excellent flexural and bond strengths, color control, minimal efflorescence and high compressive strength. It is specifically designed for tile installations that will be subjected to thermal shock. It resists bacteria, fungus and alkalies and does not shrink or dust.
